title: This updated, third floor condo rests in the Berkshire Condominiums
posting_body: The open & spacious living room and dining room are an entertainer's dream with seamless flow between each living space.
Enjoy scenic views through the North facing windows overlooking Lake Erie.
The galley style kitchen features newer appliances, updated tiled backsplash, ample country classic cabinetry, and convenient under cabinet lighting.
Beautiful vinyl plank padded flooring leads you to the large master bedroom with an additional bonus room attached, perfect for an office, guest “bedroom”, or extra entertainment space.
The full bathroom has been renovated with new flooring, ceramic shower tiling, new vanity with modern faucet, toilet, and light fixture.
This specific unit is close to the stairwell in case of emergencies.

Other recent upgrades include freshly painted neutral walls, new ceiling fan replaced in master bedroom, new front door knob/lock, and blinds in the living room, both professionally installed as well.
